ma‚Äôwisin mulin ma pihituwana lada ‚Äòsathischandra sanskruthika sansadaya‚Äô (sa.sa.sa.) wadamuluwalata sahabhagiwu anura waragoda, anura rathnayaka, anura kithsiri, kulasiri mallikarachchi, hemachandra piyadasa, rohitha dayas, jayathilaka ambauldeniya saha aananda athukorala men ma polgahawela ‚Äòmuthuhara‚Äô lama samajaye samajika samajikawan wana aananda polgahawela, rupa pathirana yana pradhana wishala pirisak da mage sewane wikasitha wu kala shilpin shilpiniyan ya.
